channel.title: Stefan Roski's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content on Stefan Roski's Homepage

item.title: CV
item.description:
Currrent appointment

Since 02/2025
Lecturer in Theoretical Philosophy, Philosophy Department, University of Zurich

Previous appointments

09/2022 – 01/2025
Executive Director, Centre for Philosophy of Science, University of Münster

05/2018 – 01/2025
Post-Doc in Stephan Krämer’s Emmy Noether Group Relevance

10/2021 – 08/2022
Deputy Professor for Theoretical Philosophy, Institute of Philosophy, Saarland University

10/2015 – 04/2018
Post-Doc at the chair of Benjamin Schnieder and in several projects led by Schnieder and Richard Woodward, Hamburg University

item.title: Publications
item.description:
Monograph

(2017) Bolzano’s Conception of Grounding. Frankfurt am Main: Klostermann.

Edited

(202X) Handbuch Analytische Philosophie. Heidelberg: J.B. Metzler (co-edited with Hanjo Glock and Christoph Pfisterer)

(202X) Hyperintensional Formal Epistemology. Special Issue of Synthese (co-edited with Singa Behrens and Stephan Krämer)

(2024) Difference-Making and Explanatory Relevance. Special Issue of Philosophical Studies (co-edited with Singa Behrens and Stephan Krämer)

(2022) Bolzano’s Philosophy of Grounding. Translations and Studies. Oxford University Press (co-edited with Benjamin Schnieder)

Articles in journals

(202X) “Metaphysically Understanding Why”, forthcoming in The Journal of Philosophy (contact me for a draft.)
